title: Modernising Monaco: how to get more F1 overtaking at the Grand Prix?
summary: Despite its F1 heritage, the Monaco Grand Prix has struggled to put on a show in recent years - but there are some ideas for changes that could keep it relevant for the foreseeable future

qa_pairs.question: What is a common criticism of the Monaco Grand Prix in recent years?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: It has struggled to provide overtaking opportunities.
wrong_options: It has the fastest lap times.
It features the most competitive teams.
It has the longest race duration.

qa_pairs.question: Which feature of the Monaco circuit makes overtaking particularly challenging?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: Narrow track layout and tight corners.

qa_pairs.question: What is one proposed solution to enhance racing at the Monaco Grand Prix?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: Implementing changes to the track layout.
